com.panviva.util.pgc.rule

Class RuleSetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.panviva.util.pgc.rule.RuleSetManager

  • public class RuleSetManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the loading, parsing and housing of a set of rules. The rules are loaded from the user supplied rules.xml rules template file.
    Author:
    jcharles
